items.sentence: Tom was the first person to encourage me to do that.
Tom and Mary eloped and are now living in Australia.
When I found Tom, I could see that he'd been crying.
Tom was always ready to help anyone who needed help.
My neighbor always mows his lawn on Sunday mornings.
Tell me the truth, unless you think I can't take it.
Those who speak about happiness often have sad eyes.
Why is everyone being so nice to me all of a sudden?
Did I understand the gist of the question correctly?
I haven't been to work. I've stayed at home all day.
